name: Hotel Demeure Les Mouettes
description: Ideally located in the gulf of Ajaccio, with direct access to a small beach, Hôtel-Demeure Les Mouettes is a charming 19th-century house. Stay in one of the hotel's large rooms, some with terraces providing superb views of the gulf. For your convenience, rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and mini fridges. Take a refreshing dip in the hotel's private pool or in the clear blue waters of the Mediterranean sea before resting in the shade of palm trees. Local cold meats and cheeses are available throughout the day for those wishing to enjoy some of the best local flavours without leaving the hotel's sunny terrace.

name: Best Western Plus Ajaccio Amiraute
description: The Best Western Plus® Ajaccio Amiraute is ideally located close to the Congress Center, the harbour, the city center, and the airport. With its exceptional view over the sea, this property, will offer you all of the best, three star services: solarium terrace, heated swimming-pool (from March until November), private covered garage, Wi-Fi access, conference hall, business corner, office, restaurant, front desk and snacks 24 hours. We invite you to visit Ajaccio, Bonaparte House, Imperial Chapel, Fesch Museum, the wonderful Gulf of Ajaccio, with more than 20 kilometers of white fine sand, and Filitosa, Piana, Scandola, Bonifacio and Porto-Vecchio.bestwestern.com

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Ajaccio Bay
description: Just 100 metres from Agosta Beach, this hotel features a spa with hammam and hot tub, a terrace and a garden with a heated, outdoor pool with a poolside bar. It proposes air-conditioned rooms and car rental. Free Wi-Fi is available in each en suite room. All rooms feature extras long beds, a balcony and ironing facilities. Breakfast is provided in the form of a buffet each morning. For other meals you can try regional food in the restaurant while enjoying views of Ajaccio Bay. Afterwards you can relax in the hotel bar. Located 5 km from Porticcio and its beach, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa is 19 km from Ajaccio town centre. Services include a laundry, business centre and organisation of excursions.

name: Palm Beach Hotel
address: Route Des Iles Sanguinaires, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Palm Beach features direct access to the private beach and a restaurant with a terrace overlooking the ocean "Mediterranean Sea'. This 4-star hotel offers rooms with sea views and is just 5 km from Ajaccio city centre. An LCD TV with satellite channels features in the rooms and suites at Palm Beach. All accommodation is air-conditioned and some have a separate living area. Breakfast can be served to all rooms. The continental breakfast is also served on the terrace. Guests can also relax in the bar and browse the free Wi-Fi. Free public parking is available on site and the Sanguinaires Islands are 7 km away. Guests may also choose to drive to Ajaccio Harbour, which is 10 km away.

name: Hôtel Fesch & Spa
description: Hôtel Fesch & spa is situated in the centre of Ajaccio, just a 5-minute walk from the ferry port and 500 metres from the beach. It offers guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The guest rooms at the Fesch are equipped with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and mini-bars. Each is air conditioned and has a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a generous buffet breakfast every morning, either in the dining room, on the outdoor terrace, or in the guest rooms. Additional facilities include a 24-hour front desk and a lift. Set on Corsica’s Mediterranean Coast, Hôtel Fesch & spa is just a few steps from the Marechal Foch Central Square, and is in close proximity to Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte’s house.

name: Hotel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo
description: The Hôtel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo is a 4-star hotel located in Ajaccio’s old-town, 300 metres from the beach. This Corsican mansion offers air-conditioned guest rooms with LCD satellite TV and free internet. The Hôtel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo is 100 metres from the Ajaccio Cathedral and the Casa Buonaparte. Guests can enjoy tours of the old town and visits to its museums and galleries. The Hôtel Palazzu Pozzo di Borgo is a 1.5 km drive from Ajacco ferry port and 6 km from Campo dell'Oro Airport.

name: Hotel Restaurant & Spa L'Ostella
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 52 guestrooms featuring espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bastia? This hotel has facilities measuring 3660 square feet (340 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hôtel Spa Restaurant l'Ostella in Bastia, you'll be in the business district, within a 5-minute drive of L'Arinella Beach and Citadel. This 4-star hotel is 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from Bastia Vieux Port Marina and 2.4 mi (3.9 km) from Church of St-Jean-Baptiste. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Bastia, a bar/lounge which specializes in Mediterranean cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 1.32 per person, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 22 per person Pet fee: EUR 15 per pet, per night Service animals are exempt from fees Rollaway bed fee: EUR 25.0 per day A facilities fee includes use of: sauna The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 4:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve cribs/infant beds and rollaway/extra beds This property accepts credit cards Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. The hotel offers cribs for babies up to 3 years old and rollaway beds for children under 13 years old (subject to availability). Children under 16 years old are allowed in the pool and spa 7-10 AM and 1-4 PM and must be accompanied by an adult. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Essential workers only - NO Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hotel Port Toga
address: Rond Point DE Toga, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Hotel Port Toga is located in Bastia, just a 2-minute walk from Port de Toga. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. The guest rooms and suites feature a flat-screen TV, desk and security deposit box. The private bathrooms have either a bath or shower. The suites also offer a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available every morning serving locally sourced produce. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Saint-Florent is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Poretta Airport, 21 km from Hotel Port Toga.

name: Hôtel Des Gouverneurs
address: 3 Bis Rue Des Turquines, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Featuring an indoor pool and panoramic sea views from the terrace, Hôtel Des Gouverneurs is a seafront property in the pedestrianised citadel area of Bastia, just 90 metres from Bastia Museum, 2 minutes' walk from the Old Port and 5 minutes' walk from the city centre. Guests can relax in the bar. There is free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms and suites feature a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle, and a private bathroom, hairdryer and free toiletries. The suites have a seating area and a sea view. A buffet or continental breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Des Gouverneurs. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including snorkeling and windsurfing. Paid public parking can be found within 200 metres of the property. L’Île-Rousse is 70 km from Hôtel Des Gouverneurs, while Saint-Florent is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, a 30-minute drive from Hôtel Des Gouverneurs.

name: Chez Walter
description: Chez Walter has rooms with views of its Mediterranean garden and is a 10-minute drive from Marana beaches. It has an outdoor swimming pool, tennis court, and the restaurant serves local produce on its terrace. Free Wi-Fi access and a TV with satellite channels are available in each air-conditioned, bright room. Guest rooms include a minibar, an en suite bathroom and a private entrance. A continental breakfast can be taken in the room. Guests can sample specialities grown in the region or locally caught fish in the restaurant with views over the garden and swimming pool. Chez Walter is in between the tourist train stations of Borgo and Lucciana, both 18 minutes' walking distance. The hotel is 15 km from Bastia and 4 km from Bastia-Poretta Airport. Chez Walter is in between the tourist train stations of Borgo and Lucciana, both 18 minutes' walking distance. -> Chez Walter is near the train station of Casamozza both 5 minutes walking distance.

name: Hotel Mariana
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the centre of Calvi, this hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool with panoramic views of the sea and the mountains. It also has a hot tub, a sauna and fitness room. A flat-screen TV is provided in the air-conditioned guest rooms. Each has its own balcony and a private bathroom with bathroom products. Continental breakfasts can be delivered directly to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet. Afterwards, guests can relax on sun loungers on the large terrace and use Wi-Fi for free. Calvi’s sandy beaches are a 10-minute walk from Le Mariana and Ile Rousse is 25 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Castel Brando
description: In the picturesque, seafront village of Erbalunga is the Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa. This authentic 19th century private house sits in its own grounds and offers charming accommodation. The family-owned Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa presents a peaceful backdrop to your Corsican holidays. The rooms are all en suite and propose bright and spacious living spaces. The Demeure Castel Brando Hôtel & Spa offers a range of teas, homemade cakes and delicacies. You can enjoy those in the library lounge or, in the summertime, on the shady patio or park planted with 100-year old palm trees and lime trees. Guests can also enjoy some Mediterranean food at the Les Américains restaurant on-site.

name: Hôtel Mercure Bastia Biguglia
description: The hotel is located in Biguglia, between Bastia-Poretta Airport and Bastia city center. Easy access to the hotel via the expressway linking the airport to the city center. The hotel offers 83 rooms, a restaurant, a bar, meeting rooms and a spa with fitne ss room.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Rocabella
description: Boasting a bar, Hôtel & Spa Rocabella is situated in LʼÎle-Rousse in the Corsica region, 100 metres from Nautique Beach and 300 metres from Digue Beach. Featuring a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The wellness area includes a sauna, and hot tub, while a terrace is also available. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Hôtel & Spa Rocabella features some rooms with sea views, and rooms are fitted with a coffee machine. The rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at Hôtel & Spa Rocabella. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around LʼÎle-Rousse, like hiking. Popular points of interest near Hôtel & Spa Rocabella include Lotissement des Iles Beach, Napoleon Beach and L'Ile-Rousse Port. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Lodge De Charme A Cheda
description: Surrounded by a large garden, A Cheda is located at the entrance of Bonifacio. From April to October, guests can make use of the heated outdoor pool and hot tub. Other spa facilities include a sauna and body treatments. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has elegantly and individual decor with exposed beams and stone walls. They are equipped with a terrace overlooking the garden, flat-screen TV with DVD player and free WiFi. A Cheda’s restaurant offers gourmet Mediterranean cuisine made with local products and organic ingredients. Meals can be served in the chic dining area or beside the pool. A cookery workshop with the hotel's chef is available on site. For families with small children, a baby kit can be provided. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar or on the outdoor terrace. Guided tours and boat trips can be organised. The hotel is a 7-minute drive from the Sperone golf course and a 15-minute drive from Figari Sud Airport.

name: Golfe Hotel
description: Golfe Hotel is located in an urban setting on the road to Porto-Vecchio harbour. It is 900 metres from Porto Vecchio and a 15-minute drive from the beaches of southern Corsica. It features an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. All of the air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and minibar. Some rooms feature a terrace and a hot tub. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Additional facilities include a fitness room and a SPA. The Golfe Hotel is ideal for guests with a car. Lezza Golf Course is 6 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Boutique Hotel Liberata
address: La Marinella - - Isola Rossa, 20220 L'Île-Rousse, Corsica
description: Set in a traditional Corsican mansion in the centre of L’Île-Rousse, Hôtel Liberata offers direct access to the beach and panoramic sea views. Guests can relax by the heated, outdoor swimming pool or in the spa free of charge. The rooms at Hôtel Liberata are air conditioned and offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace and all rooms have a private bathroom with a shower, slippers and bathrobe. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served, and guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Restaurants can be found within a 5 minute walk from the hotel. The Calvi - Sainte-Catherine Airport is just 30 minutes away and L’Île-Rousse Port with ferries to Marseilles, Nice, Toulon and Vado Ligure is just 1 km away. Guests can enjoy the hammam, massages, and fitness room at the hotel. Free private parking is available on-site.

name: Hotel Genovese
address: Quartier De La Citadelle Haute Ville, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located on the southern coast of Corsica in Bonifacio, Hotel Spa Genovese has a cliff top position with panoramic views. It has an outdoor pool with a sun terrace and lounge chairs. Guests can dine in the onsite restaurant, and in the summer meals are served on the poolside. WiFi is available throughout the property. Renovated in 2018, rooms are situated in the Genovese’s main property, while the suites are in a separate port-side building. Each guest room has a modern décor with air-conditioning and satellite TV. Breakfast is served daily at Hotel Spa Genovese. The restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and specialises in Mediterranean fish and pasta dishes. Hotel Spa Genovese provides a 24-hour reception, where guided boat tours can be arranged. It offers free private parking, 20 km from the Figari-Sud Corse Airport.

name: Hotel Centre Nautique
address: Quai Nord, Port de Plaisance, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located in Bonifacio, 1.3 km from Arinella Beach, Hotel Centre Nautique provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can make use of a bar. All units in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Hotel Centre Nautique each room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or American breakfast. Bonifacio Port is 100 metres from Hotel Centre Nautique, while Former Chapel of the Trinity is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Kasano
description: Set in Calvi, 400 metres from Roncu Beach, KASANO & Spa features views of the sea. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features an outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and bar. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The units feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the property. Pinède Beach is less than 1 km from KASANO & Spa, while Alga Beach is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar
address: San Ciprianu Boulevard Napoléon, 20137 Lecci, Corsica
description: Facing the beachfront, Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar offers 4-star accommodation in Porto-Vecchio and features a terrace, restaurant and bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a hammam and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto-Vecchio, like cycling. Saint Cyprien is 200 metres from the hotel, while Tour Beach is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 31 km from Hôtel Spa & Restaurant - Son de Mar.

name: l'Escale Cote Sud
description: L'Escale Côté Sud has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in LʼÎle-Rousse. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At L'Escale Côté Sud rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near L'Escale Côté Sud include Napoleon Beach, Nautique Beach and Digue Beach. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Castel d'Orcino
address: Baie de la Liscia, 20111 Calcatoggio, Corsica
description: Hotel Castel d’Orcino is set on the southern Corsican coast, overlooking the Mediterranean sea, 800 metres from Calcatoggio beach. It provides peaceful accommodation with 2 swimming pools. The spacious guest rooms feature air conditioning, free Wi-Fi internet access and a patio or balcony. Castel d’Orcino offers a daily buffet breakfast which can be served in the breakfast room or in the guest rooms. Free private parking is available for guests exploring the surrounding countryside and national parks by car. The town of Ajaccio, with its port and rail connections, is 20 km away. Campo dell’Oro Airport is • 25 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Corsica
description: Hotel Corsica offers panoramic view of Calvi bay, set in the Corsican hills. It has an outdoor heated pool, sunbathing terrace Each of the Hotel Corsica’s air-conditioned guest rooms has a private bathroom with amenities, satellite TV and a private balcony. Free WiFi is available. For no extra fee, guests of Hotel Corsica can relax in the spa area which includes a hammam, a sauna, a hot tub and a fitness room. For a fee, massages and other treatments using Corsican products can be booked. A full buffet breakfast is available in the mornings and lunch can be enjoyed by the Hotel Corsica’s swimming pool. Room service options are also available. The shuttle to the Calvi airport and train station is free and the shuttle to the city centre and the beach is possible provided the purchase of a package for € 20.00 per day and per room.

name: La Solenzara Hôtel
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a spa, La Solenzara hôtel / Résidence is located in Sari Solenzara by the sea. Free WiFi access is available. The hotel is located on the beachfront, 37.9 km from Porto-Vecchio and 500 meter from the marina. Each room is accessible by stairs only and will provide you with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Guests can also stay in a ground floor apartment with a bedroom, equipped kitchenette, bathroom and living room. At La Solenzara hôtel / Résidence you will find a hot tub, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, luggage storage and dry cleaning. The property offers free parking. The property is at the foot of the Bavella mountains, where guests can go hiking or canyoning. Figari-Sud Corse Airport is 65 km away. Located 200 meters from the center of Sari Solenzara. Our rooms are comfortable without fridge and balcony. Only the apartments have a small kitchen with fridge and small terrace. Pool towels available at reception free of charge.

name: Hotel Revellata
description: Hotel Revellata is located in the Corsican town of Calvi, 450 metres from the harbour and 100 metres from Ronco Beach. It has an outdoor heated pool, a gym, and a spa with a hot tub, sauna and indoor lap pool. Free WiFi is available throughout and free secure private parking is available onsite. Each guest room at the Revellata features air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms have a private balcony. Guests of the Revellata Hotel can relax with a drink in the bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement. Massages are available upon reservation and for an extra charge. The Hotel Revellata is situated 1 km from Calvi Beach and the Cathedral. The Torra di Calvi are just 500 metres away and guests can enjoy tennis and water sports nearby.

name: Le Roc e Fiori Hotel
description: Located 4km south of Porto-Vecchio in Corsica, the Roc E Fiori Hotel is near the Santa Giulia and Palombaggia beaches. It has a swimming pool, hot tub, hammam and pool-side terrace. Massages can be arranged, at an extra cost. Le Roc E Fiori offers rooms with a private terrace that overlooks the garden and the mountains. They each have a separate seating area with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Fiori’s bar and have lunch at the pool bar. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout and a computer is at guests' disposal at the reception. The hotel also offers a bicycle and scooter rental service, massages and exfoliating treatments upon request.

name: A Speranza Suites De Charme By A Cheda
address: Route de Porto Vecchio, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located in Bonifacio, 4.6 km from Bonifacio Port, A SPERANZA Suites de Charme by A Cheda provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. All units at A SPERANZA Suites de Charme by A Cheda are equipped with a seating area. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Former Chapel of the Trinity is 7.7 km from A SPERANZA Suites de Charme by A Cheda, while Porto Vecchio Port is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Le Neptune & Spa
description: Le Neptune & Spa is located in the centre of Propriano in the south of Corsica, in Valinco bay. It offers a hammam, hot tub and fitness room, which are available at certain times and subject to availability. Free private parking is available onsite. Le Neptune & Spa has air-conditioned rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. Some rooms offer a view of the sea. The spa centre offers a variety of body and beauty treatments (upon reservation and at an extra cost) and guests enjoy a 15% discount for all services. Le Neptune & Spa also features a terrace with a sea view. Discover the Valinco bay, Propriano and the surroundings villages. The area offers many activities such as scuba-diving and horse-riding. Figari Sud-Corse airport is a 60-minute drive away.

name: La Villa Calvi
address: Chemin de Notre Dame de la Serra, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This 5-star hotel is set a 5-minute drive from the centre of Calvi, in the North West of Corsica. It offers 5 different swimming pools, a tennis court, a fitness centre and a variety of beauty treatments. Each spacious room has a simple, elegant décor and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a minibar. A bathrobe, slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in each private bathroom. La Table by La Villa offers Mediterranean-inspired cuisine featuring locally-caught fish and other local produce. There is also the Pool Bar or the more intimate Jo’s Bar for snacks and drinks. Guests have access to the restaurant which has a private beach. Sunbeds are reserved for guests. Calvi beach is a 15-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available and there is free private parking on site.

name: Hôtel Le Belvédère
address: Route de Palombaggia - B.P. 56, 20537 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Hôtel le Belvédère sits among pine, eucalyptus and palm trees, just opposite the old town of Porto-Vecchio. It offers 2 outdoor hot tubs and an outdoor infinity pool with sea views, surrounded by a furnished sun deck. All of the rooms feature a private terrace with a garden view and an en suite bathroom with bath, bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer. They are also air conditioned, have flat-screen TV and offer free Wi-Fi. A gastronomic restaurant and a grill restaurant, Mari e Tarra, are available on site, as well as a restaurant specialising in seafood. They offer outdoor seating with pleasant views of the surroundings. A bar and a wine cellar are also provided to enhance your gastronomic experience.

name: San Larenzu
address: Rue de la Poste, 20116 Aullene, Corsica
description: Situated in Aullène in the Corsica region, San Larenzu features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with mountain or garden views. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. The restaurant at San Larenzu specialises in French cuisine. Guests can relax in the wellness area, including a hot tub, or in the garden. There is a shared lounge at this property and guests can go cycling and walking tours nearby. Archaeological site of Cucuruzzu and Capula is 31 km from the accommodation, while Propriano Port is 37 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 59 km from San Larenzu.

name: A'mare Corsica - Seaside Resort
address: Route De La Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 26 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 spa tubs or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Propriano? This hotel has 700 square feet (65 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Miramar Corsica in Propriano, you'll be on the waterfront, just a 3-minute walk from Southern Corsica Beaches and a 2-minute drive from Les Bains de Baracci. This 5-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Plage de Capu Laurosu and 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Portigliolo Beach. Dining Grab a bite to eat at Le Deck Lounge, a poolside bar/lounge which features a pool view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between September 19 and May 25. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.20 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. name: U Capu Biancu
description: The 4-star Hotel U Capu Biancu offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Bonifacio. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, gift/souvenir shop, private check in/check out, fireplace are there for guest's enjoyment. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, sofa, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Bonifacio, Hotel U Capu Biancu will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Hôtel Le Roi Théodore & Spa
address: Avenue De Bastia Bp 9, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, an indoor heated pool, a bar and a restaurant, Hôtel Le Roi Théodore is located in Porto Vecchio. Some rooms at the hotel have a lounge-balcony overlooking the swimming pool or park. The spa area features a hamman, a spa bath and offers massages and facials. Ideally located 30 minutes' drive from the nearest airport, the hotel is also less than 5 minutes' drive from the old town centre. Cala Rossa and Saint-Cyprien beaches are 8 km away. Night-clubs, lounge-bars and restaurants are nearby, as are opportunities for enjoying numerous outdoor and water-based recreational activities. Hôtel Le Roi Théodore has its own private car park.

name: Residence Santa Maria
description: Set in LʼÎle-Rousse, 50 metres from Digue Beach, RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. Located around 200 metres from Nautique Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 800 metres away from Napoleon Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 70 metres from Lotissement des Iles Beach. All guest rooms come with a fridge, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some rooms also feature sea views. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Guests at RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. L'Ile-Rousse Port is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Pietra Lighthouse is a 16-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 21 km from RESIDENCE SANTA MARIA.

name: Résidence Chiar' DI Luna
description: No description found

name: Hotel & Spa Des Pecheurs
description: Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs is located on the island of Cavallo, between Corsica and Sardinia. The elegant hotel offers a swimming pool in its garden, a spa centre and a French and Italian restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs have a view of the sea or the garden. Guests can relax in the seating area, watching TV or using the free WiFi access. The continental breakfast is included and served in the dining room, or it can be brought to your room. The elegant hotel’s bar features a terrace that provides direct access to the private beach. Other activities include a tennis court, concierge service and diving activities. Massages are available at an additional cost. The hotel is located 8 km from the coast of Sardinia. Hotel boat transfers are available upon request for an extra charge. Public boat transfers are available only from Corsica with scheduled timetables.

name: Maranatha Porto Vecchio
description: A short distance from motor boating, fishing, and more, this pet-friendly villa lets you experience it all. With convenient onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the 11-minute drive to Santa Giulia Beach or the 10-minute drive to Palombaggia Beach. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the communal pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this 700-sq-ft villa, which also features outdoor furniture. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the WiFi and TV. This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom rental features a BBQ grill, air conditioning, concierge services, and local meal delivery service. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And thanks to the washer and dryer, you'll even be able to travel light.VRBO

name: Le Golfe
description: This 5-star Hotel is situated a short walk from the beach in Porto Pollo, south-west Corsica. All guest rooms have a terrace overlooking the sea and Valinco Bay and there is a heated swimming pool on site. Each of Le Golfe’s rooms also has air-conditioning, TV and free internet access. The Le Golfe's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and offers Mediterranean cuisine made with local ingredients, a fresh fish of the day dish, Corsican specialties and grilled meat. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar during the evenings or enjoy jet ski sessions, available at an additional cost. Le Golfe is located a 1-hour’s drive from Ajaccio and 17 km from Propriano. Guests can enjoy water sports at the nearby beaches and hiking in the surrounding countryside.

name: Les Regalia Hotel & Spa
description: Set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 600 metres from Plage de Pinarellu, Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa provides certain units with sea views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Plage de Villata is 2.9 km from Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa, while Porto Vecchio Port is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 37 km from the hotel.

name: Résidence Vasca D'oro
description: Résidence Vasca d'Oro offers self-catering accommodations located a 10-minute drive from Porto-Vecchio. Set in a 1-hectare landscaped park, this resort features a bar with a terrace and a tennis court. There is a hot tub, a sauna and 2 swimming pools, one of which is heated. All the villas and apartments at Vasca d’Oro have a furnished terrace with a barbecue. Each accommodation is air-conditioned. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, a stove and an electric kettle. Bread and French pastries can be delivered to your door upon request. Additional facilities at Vasca d’Oro include massage treatments, childcare services and rental bicycles. Santa-Giulia Beach and Palombaggia Beach are both about a 10-minute drive away, and local shops can be found within 2 km. The accommodation is situated 25 km from Figari Airport and a 30-minute drive from the city of Bonifacio.

name: Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague
address: Route De Pineto Route De La Canonica Road 107, Lucciana, Corsica
description: Situated in Lucciana, 16 km from Station de Furiani, Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has a sauna and room service. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature mountain views. All rooms in Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. At Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. Bastia Port is 23 km from the hotel, while Nonza Tower is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 2 km from Hôtel Spa Restaurant La Madrague.

name: Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle
description: Situated in Bonifacio, Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel has a year-round outdoor infinity pool, a spa and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Each room features a private terrace with a view. The rooms are equipped with an extra large double bed, a coffee machine, a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms have a shower, free essential oils toiletries and a hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is available every day and features local produce and Corsican recipes. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. The King Aragon Steps down to the beach are 1.6 km from the property while Spérone Golf Course is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 24 km from the property. for any reservation of more than 3 rooms special conditions are applicable

name: Hotel Riva Beach
description: No description found

name: Hotel L'Acquale
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the town centre of Calvi and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is 500 metres from the port and 800 metres from the white sandy beach. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms feature a balcony with a view. Each guest room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Hotel L'Acquale features a lounge bar. A continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also order breakfast à la carte. Free, secure, covered parking garage is available on site. The property is 7 km from Calvi Sainte-Catherine Airport.

name: Hotel Minera
description: Featuring free WiFi and a spa & wellness centre, Hotel Minera offers accommodation in L’Île-Rousse. With a garden, the property also has a terrace, as well as a bar. The property provides sea views and an outdoor pool. At the hotel, rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, and some rooms include a terrace. At Hotel Minera, every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Some rooms have a private pool. The spa includes a hammam and massages are available at an extra cost. The property is 2.8 km from L'Ile-Rousse Port and 3.3 km from Pietra Lighthouse. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le Ruesco
address: Capicciollo, Route De Porto Pollo, 20113 Olmeto, Corsica
description: Le Ruesco is situated on the northern side of the Valinco Gulf. It is located in a wooded and floral park, just 50 metres from the beach. The hotel’s outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace make it an excellent base for a relaxing break. A lounge area is available beside the pool. The hotel is composed of 25 spacious and comfortable rooms with a terrace and a clear view of the sea. All rooms have direct-dial telephone, flat-screen TV, air-conditioning and a bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available each morning. A bar service is available from 11:00 to 17:00. As a vehicle is necessary to access the residence, a private car park is available on site. The hotel also offers direct access to the beach.

name: Pozzo di Mastri
address: Lieu dit Pozzo di Mastri, 20114 Figari, Corsica
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, a large garden and a restaurant, Domaine Pozzo di Mastri is located in Figari. The property is within a 15-minute drive from the coastline. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. Each non-smoking room here will provide you with air conditioning and a TV. The private bathrooms have a shower and come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Domaine Pozzo di Mastri you will find a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a children's playground. The property offers free parking. Figari-Sud Corse Airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Les Suites d'Agosta
address: Lotissement de la Pinède, 20166 Porticcio, Corsica
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a refrigerator and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, towels, and rollaway beds.Expedia

name: Hacienda La Demeure
address: Vitricione Plaine D Oletta, Oletta, Corsica
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Hacienda LA Demeure is a guest house located in Saint-Florent. The property is within 5 km from the city centre and the beach. Free WiFi access is available. The suites will provide you with a bedroom, a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. The kitchen area is equipped with a microwave, stovetop, oven, refrigerator and dining table. A breakfast is served every morning by the hosts. Featuring a spa bath, the private bathroom also comes with a shower and bathrobe. You can enjoy mountain and garden views from the rooms. At Hacienda LA Demeure you will find a garden and BBQ facilities. Extras include a washing machine, a minibar and an iPod dock. The property offers free parking. This holiday home is 25 km from Bastia - Poretta Airport.

name: Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia
address: Route De Palombaggia - Bp 114, Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Offering an outdoor pool and outdoor hot tub, Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia is situated in Porto-Vecchio. Palombaggia Beach is 2.1 km from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units are air conditioned and include a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and Wifi. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a dishwasher, an oven, and a microwave. All units have a private furnished terrace with a plancha grill. Free private parking is also available on site. Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia also includes a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Massages using local products are available on site upon request and for an extra charge. Free use of bicycles is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Hotel Calavita Rooftop & Spa
description: Hôtel Calavita Rooftop & Spa is located a few steps from the coast, in northern Corsica. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms, with a private bathroom, TV and free WiFi internet. The restaurant serves refined regional cuisine, seafood specialties and a wide selection of wines, in the hotel’s elegant dining room. Breakfast is available in the mornings. Central Bastia and the Marina is situated a 5-minute drive from Hôtel Calavita Rooftop & Spa and the airport is just 20 minutes away.

name: Suite Home Porticcio
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a fenced pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Aethos Corsica
description: This hotel is a 17th-century palace set in a garden of olive and palm trees. Guests are invited to enjoy the original art, outdoor pool or terrace with panoramic views. The en suite rooms at Aethos Corsica all offer air conditioning and heating. Each has a view of the surrounding area and a flat-screen TV. Aethos Corsica has been decorated by interior designer Nathalie Battesti, student of Andrée Putman and Christian Liaigre. The hotel is located in Oletta, Upper Corsica, 22.5 km from Bastia Airport. It is a 7-minute car ride to Padula Lake, 20 km from Bastia and 10 km from Saint-Florent and its beaches.
